availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Carter County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Frances Boggs. Married to Temperance McGuire Boggs. James M. Boggs, Samantha Boggs, Hannah Boggs, Commodore Boggs, and Peace Boggs. Resident of Carter County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Carter County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, District 1, p. 279A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, p. 275.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carter County, Precinct 7, p. 159B.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994030, Carter County Births.
